text: Epicurean le Stoic minchupungei lâia khomin an inkhalpuia. Senkhat chu, “Hi mûr thiempa hin imo misîr rang a bôk hi?” an tia. Adangngeiin chu, “Ram dang pathienngei chong a misîr rang ani hi,” Paul, Jisua le inthoinôkna.17:18: Jisua le inthoinôkna: Greek chongin nupang rokôknân chu, “inthoinôkna” hi pathien nupang ngei riming riet thei ani.  misîr sika ani.
